English: Total seconds a player was crowd-controlled.
Traditional_Chinese: 玩家對其他玩家人群控制的總秒數。

English: Total seconds a player applied crowd-control effect on other players.
Traditional_Chinese: 玩家對其他玩家施加人群控制效果的總秒數。

English: Total damage a player amplified through effects like Holycross, Swordcross, etc.
Traditional_Chinese: 透過聖十字、劍十字等效果放大玩家的總傷害。

English: Total damage a player mitigated through effects like Damage Redirection, etc.
Traditional_Chinese: 玩家透過傷害重定向等效果減輕的總傷害。
